string_table.name: pxabnsnfns11111111101
string_table.string: To preview this video, use the Preview functionality in Storyline, republish your course using standard MP4 video, or publish to Review 360.
Streaming video is unavailable for local playback.
Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

For guidance on completing and navigating through this course, select the question mark icon located at the top right corner." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
